comments.author: Vegan
comments.content: The color alone is totally mouthwatering. Roasted carrots is a very quick and easy dish to make but do you have some tips on choosing the right carrots for roasting?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Nothing too specific, but clearly the sweeter the carrot you start with, the sweeter the ultimate result will be. I would probably tend to use farmer's market or organic carrots that are medium sized - not so small that they won't have enough interior, nor so big that they are likely to be bland and woody.
